CustomField.description: Set the log level for which messages printed to the compute logger. Whenever a statement is logged and the statements level is encompassed by the currently set General Log Level, the message will be forwarded to the compute logger instance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Set the log level for which messages are stored in the log stack for a transaction. Valid values are NONE, TRACE, DEBUG, INFO, WARN, ERROR, and FATAL. Any statements with a level equal or higher to the one configured here will be logged.
CustomField.label: Functions Compute Log Level
